alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Lancaster (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 6:19PM EDT until September 07 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Fairfield County in central South Carolina... Southwestern Lancaster County in central South Carolina... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 619 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles east of Blackstock, or 11 miles north of Winnsboro, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Lancaster, Springdale, Elgin, Heath Springs, Irwin, Lancaster Mill, Bell Town Fire Station, McWhirter Airfield, Mitford, Faith Christian School, and McDonald Green Elementary School. This includes Interstate 77 between mile markers 40 and 51. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
